mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TB(nummac, idmac, pwmac, nicknamemac, emailmac, gendermac, birthmac, phonenummac, citymac, townmac, villagemac, namemac) VALUES(USER_NUM.nextval, #{idMac},pkg_crypto.encrypt(#{pwMac}),#{nickNameMac},#{emailMac},#{genderMac},#{birthMac},#{phoneNumMac},#{cityMac},#{townMac},#{villageMac},#{nameMac})
mapper.select: SELECT nummac, idmac, pkg_crypto.decrypt(pwmac) pwMac, nicknamemac, emailmac, gendermac, birthmac, phonenummac, citymac, townmac, villagemac, namemac FROM USER_TB
SELECT nummac, idmac, pkg_crypto.decrypt(pwmac) pwMac, nicknamemac, emailmac, gendermac, birthmac, phonenummac, citymac, townmac, villagemac, namemac FROM USER_TB WHERE idmac= #{idMac}
SELECT nummac, idmac, pkg_crypto.decrypt(pwmac) pwMac, nicknamemac, emailmac, gendermac, birthmac, phonenummac, citymac, townmac, villagemac, namemac FROM USER_TB WHERE nicknamemac= #{nickNameMac}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_TB SET pwmac=pkg_crypto.encrypt(#{pwMac}), emailmac=#{emailMac}, phonenummac=#{phoneNumMac}, citymac=#{cityMac}, townmac=#{townMac}, villagemac=#{villageMac} WHERE idmac=#{idMac}
